column1: ANNUAL_BALANCE = Annual mass balance of glacier divided by the area of the glacier in mm water equivalent (mm w.e.)
Informations about INVESTIGATOR, SPONS_AGENCY and REMARKS as reported to the WGMS
When using the data, cite the World Glacier Monitoring Service (WGMS 2013, updated, and earlier volumes)
and/or the original investigators and sponsoring agencies according to the available meta-information.

WGMS (2013, updated, and earlier volumes): Glacier Mass Balance Bulletin No. 12 (2010–2011). Zemp, M., Nussbaumer, S. U., Naegeli, K., Gärtner-Roer, I., Paul, F., Hoelzle, M., and Haeberli, W. (eds.), ICSU(WDS)/IUGG(IACS)/UNEP/UNESCO/WMO, World Glacier Monitoring Service, Zurich, Switzerland, 106 pp. Data based on database version doi:10.5904/wgms-fog-2014-09.
Note that this file contains only a minimal set of data fields.
Full information on available attributes can be found on the WGMS website: http://www.wgms.ch/downloads/WGMS_AttributeDescription.pdf
And can be ordered by email: wgms@geo.uzh.ch
